block.p: Dr. Mallika Joy Marshall, the daughter of Carole Simpson and James E. Marshall of Chevy Chase, Md., was married yesterday to Jason Hansen Hurd, a son of Dr. and Mrs. Joseph K. Hurd Jr. of Wellesley Hills, Mass. The Rev. Janice M. Robinson performed the Episcopal ceremony at the Washington National Cathedral.

Dr. Marshall, 30, is keeping her name. She recently completed a residency in internal medicine and pediatrics at Massachusetts General Hospital, Children's Hospital and Brigham and Women's Hospital in Boston. In September, she is to become the assistant director of the Chelsea Urgent Care Center in Chelsea, Mass. She graduated cum laude from Harvard University, as did her husband, and received her medical degree from the University of California at San Francisco. Her father is a financial systems consultant in Chevy Chase. Her mother is a news anchor and senior correspondent for ABC News.

His father is the chairman of gynecology at the Lahey Clinic Medical Center in Burlington, Mass.
